description.message: Ever wanted to fall asleep to Twitch like you do to your TV? This extension is for you.

keyword.description: Keyword typed into the chrome omnibox to access the extension

browserActionTitle.description: Mouseover message for the browser button next to address bar

popupAboutTooltip.description: Mouseover Message for the Logo in the Popup

popupOptionsTooltip.description: Mouseover Message for the Options Button in the Popup

popupWatchTooltip.description: Mouseover Message for the Watch Button in the Popup

aboutPartOne.message: This will be the about page with donation button.
aboutPartOne.description: First paragraph of the About View

aboutPartTwo.message: In the TOS for using the 'Glyphicon Pack' we need to feature
aboutPartTwo.description: Second paragraph of the About View

aboutPartThree.message: in a prominent part of the application. Here is probably appropriate.
aboutPartThree.description: Third paragraph of the About View

aboutGlyphiconLink.description: Glyphicon Link in the About View

playerPreviousTooltip.description: Mouseover Message for the Previous Button in the Player View

playerPlayPauseTooltip.description: Mouseover Message for the Play/Pause Button in the Player View

playerNextTooltip.description: Mouseover Message for the Next Button in the Player View

playerLinearShuffleTooltip.description: Mouseover Message for the Linear/Shuffle Button in the Player View

playerSleepTimerTooltip.description: Mouseover Message for the SleepTimer Slider in the Player View

optionsTitle.description: Title for the Advanced Options Page

optionsDonateLabel.description: Label for the Donate Navigation Button

optionsApplyButton.description: Label Message for the Apply Button in the Options View

optionsAdvancedLabel.description: Label Message for the Advanced Label in the Options View

optionsUsernamePlaceholder.description: Placeholder Message for the Username Field in the Options View

optionsDefaultGamePlaceholder.description: Placeholder Message for the Default Game Field in the Options View

optionsNameApplySuccess.description: Message flashed in the Options View if the Username Option was successfully applied

optionsDefaultGameApplySuccess.description: Message flashed in the Options View if the Default Game Option was successfully applied

optionsDefaultGameNotFound.message: Default Game unable to be found. Option not saved
optionsDefaultGameNotFound.description: Message flashed in the Options View if that particular option was not saved

optionsApplyFailureUsername.message: You must enter your Twitch Username to apply
optionsApplyFailureUsername.description: Message flashed in the Options View if username options failed to apply

optionsInvalidUsername.message: The username you entered is not a Twitch User
optionsInvalidUsername.description: Message flashed in the Options View if username options is not valid

errorClearButton.description: Label Message for the Clear Button in the Error View

errorUnimplementedFeature.description: Error Message if a feature is not yet implemented
